ygData.subject: Re: Dragon portal in Great Divide
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info. Barto ... that ... level ... opening ... a sort ... straight ... the ... http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info.

Barto

--- In EverQuest@y..., "Thomas H. Comegys" <tcomegys@s...> wrote:
> It's a druid ring, nothing more, nothing less.
>
> Not an entirely safe place to port to, either. Feral kodiaks (bears
that
> hate everyone, even druids) wander through, as do some of the lower
level
> shardwurms. Just make sure SoW is up. Exit straight out through the
opening
> in the portal when you get there and run straight northwest through
a sort
> of valley (levitate is nice, too) until you see a river, then head
straight
> north along the river. That will lead you to Thurgadin, hidden by
the
> waterfall, and safety. unless you have made an enemy of the Coldain,
> somehow.
>
> Froondor, 48 WE druid of Tarew Marr
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "mlockridge01" <MLockridge01@c...>
> To: <EverQuest@y...>
> Sent: Tuesday, December 03, 2002 2:01 AM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Dragon portal in Great Divide
>
>
> > Just what is the Dragon Portal in GD? Is it just a druid ring, or
> > some kind of automatic portal to somewhere else?
> >
> > Barto
> >
> >
> > Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
> >

http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
